reviews.review: Very good game and very fun

Muito bom o jogo nas primeiras caixas que abri ganhei uma faca canivete, eu não sabia que era tao dificil ter uma faca no jogo e acabei vendendo ela, para comprar outros jogos... Agora estou tentando ter uma de novo.

Been playing Counter strike since the 1.6 days, through Condition Zero, Source, and now Global Offensive, having countless numbers of hours poured into this game, I'm saddened to leave this review. With the current condition of this game, it's isn't a pleasant experience to say the least. Hackers, poor matchmaking with respect to the ranks of the players, issues with VAC authentication that results in abandoning a competitive match and penalties in the form of search cooldowns which gets progressively worse every time you get disconnected due to no fault of your own, these issues make it virtually impossible to have a pleasant time with this game. Don't get me wrong , CSGO is what made me love the FPS genre in gaming. I have a nostalgic connection with this game, which keeps bringing me back to this game, despite of not enjoying the gameplay due to a plethora of issues. Hopefully this gem of a game would one day be rescued from it's current predicament and once again be a pleasant experience, like the golden days.

O jogo espetacular, não existe um FPS que possa ser comparado ao counter-strike. De fato o CS:GO tem um problema com cheaters, mas não é nem próximo do que parece vendo as reviews aqui na steam. A valve busca diversas formas de banir os cheaters e logo que você pega experiência no jogo e fica com um trust factor bom você praticamente não vê mais nenhum cheater.
